This game is created occasionally.

One day my dorm mate is cleaning up his bookshelf, reviewing an old Android book named 《Android Heroes Biography》(Android群英传). Its appendix contains a codelab teaching you to build up a 2048 game hand by hand, which suddenly recall me back to days learning that book when I was an freshman on Android. 

That is inspired me a lot. I always remind me that the best way to learn something is making it yourself. "What I cannot create, I do not understand", Feynman said. So I spent around 2 days finishing this 2048 game with only system-provided UI components. Hoping that this game can bring you fun and, some guide to your life.
